poem1.Title: My Scars
poem1.Body:
The wind was flowing, 
The treess were talking, 
The oceans were waving, 
The clothes on the rope were chuckling, 
The Thunder was roaring, 
The rain was dancing, 
And the boy was happy thinking the 
Moon was singing along the stars as 
the wind flowed across his scars.

poem2.Title: Silent Tears
poem2.Body: Days will pass And turn to years And I'll always remember you, With silent tears.

Chapter1.Title: Yash Going Missing
Chapter1.Body: Aisha was cleaning kitchen until she realized that Yash has not woke up early today for his usual jogging at 6'o clock. She called Yash from kitchen, but no response. She assumed he must be tired today, so she started cooking breakfast.

Musings.Author: SciKido
Musings.1:
My demons come free, With the angels in me.
How can you love just a part of me?
Musings.2:
I just can't stop staring at the sky, 
questioning myself were the stars still glitering when then world was being formed.
Musings.3:
I know I won't talk to you, 
But never talking to you is the thing I will regret forever
Musings.4:
I know we were'nt perfect, 
But just a little longer would've made us perfect.
Musings.5:
Life i svery Boring, 
if you make it!
Musings.6:
You have to learn to play fire with fire 
in accordance to live satisfyingly
